class.name: bot_differential_drive/DifferentialDriveSerialInterface
class.description: This is a driff drive using a system hardware interface-type. It uses velocity command and position state interface. The example is the starting point to implement a hardware interface for differential-drive mobile robots.

class.name: bot_differential_drive/DifferentialDriveMock
class.description: This is a diff drive mock using a system hardware interface-type. It uses velocity command and position state interface. The example is the starting point to implement a hardware interface for differential-drive mobile robots.
